block.p: Michelle Ann Baez, a daughter of Carole Baez and Dr. Julio C. Baez of Scarsdale, N.Y., was married yesterday to Jason Dmitri Asch, a son of Sherry Asch and Dr. Harvey Asch of Chappaqua, N.Y. Rabbi Burt Aaron Siegel officiated at Le Chateau, a restaurant in South Salem, N.Y.

Mrs. Asch, 31, is the schools and outreach manager in the education department at the Jewish Museum in New York. She graduated from the University of Vermont and received a master's degree in art education from New York University. Her father is a radiologist at North Shore University Hospital at Glen Cove.

Michelle Ann Baez, a daughter of Carole Baez and Dr. Julio C. Baez of Scarsdale, N.Y., was married yesterday to Jason Dmitri Asch, a son of Sherry Asch and Dr. Harvey Asch of Chappaqua, N.Y. Rabbi Burt Aaron Siegel officiated at Le Chateau, a restaurant in South Salem, N.Y.

Mrs. Asch, 31, is the schools and outreach manager in the education department at the Jewish Museum in New York. She graduated from the University of Vermont and received a master's degree in art education from New York University. Her father is a radiologist at North Shore University Hospital at Glen Cove.

Mr. Asch, 31, is an advertising account executive for Esquire magazine in New York. He graduated from the State University College at Cortland, N.Y., and is a candidate for a master's degree in publishing at N.Y.U. His mother is the coordinator of early intervention programs at Richmond Community Services in New Rochelle, N.Y. His father is a clinical psychologist at Green Chimneys Children's Services in Brewster, N.Y., and has a private practice in Chappaqua, N.Y.
